content.title: Music is (just) a(nother) phonetic language
content.text: Just most of spoken languages, music has its own grammar, syntax and symbology.

texts:
When you read you begin with A, B, C
When you sing you begin with Do, Re, Me
When you sing you also begin with C, D, E

When you count you begin with 1, 2, 3
When you sing you also begin with 1, 2, 3
When you sing you also begin with Ⅰ, Ⅱ, Ⅲ
